name: On Board Game
description:
Sail thought beautiful scenes of tropical and exotic lands as you play the game of survival at the sea
while listening to the sound of music reminiscent of reggae music and electronic.


Many have sailed have seen another dawn, but few that sailed these foreign seas have found their dream.
That journey awaits you in a boat because it is now you turn to get On Board.





Features

Genre: Arcade
Players:1
Perfect For: Casual Playing
